PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02632022-03-24,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to prohibit any person in Canada and any Canadian outside Canada from exporting, selling, supplying or shipping any good to Russia or to any person in Russia, if the good is described in the Restricted Goods and Technologies List.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0067 Publication Date: 2022-04-13
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to prohibit any person in Canada and any Canadian outside Canada from exporting, selling, supplying or shipping any good to Russia or to any person in Russia, if the good is described in the Restricted Goods and Technologies List.
